config.farmsoulkitchen.task.melon_stem_l:
These entries configure the melon stem list
rule: §eattached_melon_stem_block_id
Eg: §eminecraft:attached_pumpkin_stem §eminecraft:attached_pumpkin_stem ...
config.farmsoulkitchen.task.melon_and_st:
These entries configure the melon stem and melon_block list
rule: §emelon_item_id(silk touch)§c,§eattached_melon_stem_block_id
Eg: §eminecraft:melon§c,§eminecraft:attached_melon_stem

overlay.farmsoulkitchen.book.tips:
The book will change the working mode to the retrieval start height value of the maid of the fruit
Right-click +1, stealth right-click -1
The search range is 2 blocks up from the starting height
message.farmsoulkitchen.book.max_yoffset: The value of YOffset must be within the range of -5 to 5
gui.farmsoulkitchen.btn.task_setting.des: -§a used to configer task, for example various of cooking task
gui.farmsoulkitchen.btn.task_book.desc: -§a used to open the task book entry from memorizable gensokyo
- The maid will randomly cook from all recipes removed from the blacklist
- The maid will cook randomly from the selected recipe
This cook mode type isn't selected, so can't select
This cook selected recipes is over size : %d, so can't add
- There are some problems with the recipe analysis of the crockpot task, which will be updated and optimized in the future!
- Due to the peculiarity of the furnace, it is not currently possible to interact with the culinary hub, but it will be updated and optimized in the future!
- Due to the special nature of the furnace's recipe, it is not currently controlled by the black and white list, and will be updated and optimized in the future!
- Due to the particularity of the cutting board task, it is not possible to interact with the culinary hub at present, and it will be updated and optimized in the future!
gui.farmsoulkitchen.patchouli_warning.ti: You'll need to install the Patchouli mod to open book entry feature
tooltips.farmsoulkitchen.amount.title: Craft One Amount Ingredient:
patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entrie:
Maid can cook by using mod blocks.
 You just need to put recipe ingredient on the maid inventory.

You can use the Cooking Hub to set the location of the cooking ingredients and the food chests
 It needs to be placed in the fourth slot in the first column of the maid's backpack
 If present, it interacts with the Cooking Hub - the bound crate interacts
 Ps:It is even more effective when used with gaps
- Right-click to open the GUI and select the type you want to bind
 - Stealth, right-click the chest to bind, and right-click again to unbind

This is the settings screen for the maid's cooking task, and you can click on the sidebar to jump to this screen firstn
- 1.This is a display of the current maid's cooking tasksn
- 2.Toggle cooking modes: Random and Directional (Random) moden
  - Random Mode: Completely random, randomly select the matching recipe from all the recipes for cookingn
  - Directional (Random) Mode: Randomly select matching recipes from selected recipes for cookingn
- 3.Select the food you want to cookn
- 4.You can click the up and down buttons to switch between the upper and lower page recipes, or the mouse wheel can also be used
Use this bauble to prevent kitchen homicides!
The maid collects berries, which can be configured on the maid task configuration screen
Maid can harvest fruits, which can be configured on the maid task configuration screen.
Welcome to the Farming & Cooking mod

The maid will harvest the melons around it, the same as the ontology melon quest, but the compatibility has been made, you can open the maid global configuration page or open the configuration file to configure
If you have installed Sreneeasons, the maid will plant according to the growing season
The number of breeds in this mode is divided by animal species, with a maximum of 20 per animal
patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.catego: A addon that make maid lear more skill about farm and cook.
